record.field: The contract was terminated on the %(contract_end)s, a new indemnification cannot start on %(indemn_start)s.
The contract was terminated on the %(contract_end)s, so the requested indemnification end (%(indemn_end)s) will automatically be updated.
The contract was terminated on the %(contract_end)s, there will not be any revaluation after this date.
The indemnification period (%(indemn_start)s - %(indemn_end)s) is not compatible with the contract's end date (%(contract_end)s).
The covered element %(party_rec_name)s is in rupture for the contract %(contract)s at %(date)s and the beneficiary should be the covered element itself, not %(benef_rec_name)s.
The indemnification period (%(indemn_start)s - %(indemn_end)s) is not compatible with the claim\'s management period (%(management_start)s - %(management_end)s).
The origin service must be set prior to calculation for %(service)s.
Computed amount transfered by the previous insurer: %(computation)s.
The indemnification %(indemnification)s starts before the option.
